ygData.subject: RE: Items, Ingredients, Cost and when Trivial
ygData.msgSnippet: No, but they are very hopeful.  I could probably sell one for 5k just on name alone no powers identified.  Knowing Verant, telling them I don t know what it
ygData.messageBody:
No, but they are very hopeful. I could probably sell one for 5k just on
name alone no powers identified. Knowing Verant, telling them I don't know
what it does will net me a better price than if I did know. They are
speculating on a new jewelry column for hand cut gemstones, maybe +1 on top
of the base or somesuch.

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Smith [mailto:jj@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 1:07 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Items, Ingredients, Cost and when Trivial


From: "Jason Smith" <jj@...>

So then do they know what a Gem Cutter does?

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 12:56 PM
To: 'EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Items, Ingredients, Cost and when Trivial


From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

Heh heh, gotta get those diamonds out of the economy somehow ;-(
Please say it isn't so! Guild enchanters clamoring me for a gem cutter!

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: Andy Smith [mailto:AndyS@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 12:46 PM
To: 'EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Items, Ingredients, Cost and when Trivial


From: Andy Smith <AndyS@...>

To confuse us and provide a way for players to experiment with giving
diamonds away to various NPCs in the vain hope that one of them will return
those diamonds to us in dust form.

-----Original Message-----
From: "Jason Smith" <jj@...>

Anyone know the purpose of the Gem cutter?
